defaults.title: Outfitter
defaults.description: Welcome to Outfitter, your personal outfit generator and wardrobe manager. Create stylish outfits based on your clothing items.

error.title: An error occurred
error.description: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.

homePage.title: Home
homePage.description: Welcome to Outfitter, your personal outfit generator and wardrobe manager. Create stylish outfits based on your clothing items.

logIn.title: Log In
logIn.description: Log in to your Outfitter account to manage your wardrobe and generate stylish outfits tailored to your clothing items.

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.description: Create an account on Outfitter to start managing your wardrobe and generating stylish outfits tailored to your clothing items.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Reset your Outfitter account password to regain access to your wardrobe and outfit generation features.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Set a new password for your Outfitter account and regain access to your wardrobe and outfit generation features.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.description: Manage your Outfitter account settings, including username, email, password, and security options like TOTP and passkeys.

wardrobe.title: Wardrobe
wardrobe.description: Manage your wardrobe by adding clothing items and generating stylish outfits based on your collection.

item.title: Clothing Item
item.description: View and manage your clothing item details in your Outfitter wardrobe.

edit.title: Edit Clothing Item
edit.description: Edit the details of your clothing item in your Outfitter wardrobe.

auth.badUsername: No user found with this username
auth.usernameTaken: This username is already taken. Please choose another one.
auth.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
auth.usernameTooLong: Username must be at most 20 characters long.
auth.emailInUse: This email is already in use in an active account.
auth.challengeExpired: The challenge has expired. Please try again.
auth.noPasskey: No passkey registered for this user.
auth.passkeyLoginFailed: Passkey login failed. Please try again.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
auth.passwordTooLong: Password must be at most 100 characters long.

totp.registerFailed: Failed to register TOTP. Please try again.
totp.notEnabled: You must enable TOTP to perform this action.
totp.needTOTP: You need to provide a TOTP code to perform this action.

passwordReset.noAccountWithEmail: No account associated with this e-mail!

server.connectionRefused: Connection refused. Please try again later.
server.weatherFetchFailed: Failed to fetch weather data. Please try again later.

item.classificationFailed: Failed to classify the clothing item. Please enter values manually.

outfit.delete: Failed to delete outfit. Please try again later.
outfit.notAuthorized: This outfit does not belong to you.

outfitGeneration.notEnoughItems: Not enough clothing items to generate an outfit. Please add more items to your wardrobe.
outfitGeneration.apiError: Failed to generate outfit due to an internal error. Please try again later.

successes.setUpTOTP: TOTP has been set up successfully.
successes.resetPasswordRequest: Go check your inbox to reset your password!
successes.resetPassword: Your password has been reset successfully!

logIn.title: Log in with TOTP
logIn.description: Enter your TOTP code to log in.

enable.description: 2FA is not enabled for your account.

manage.title: Manage TOTP
manage.description: You can manage your TOTP settings here.

secondStep.description: Confirm your identity by entering your TOTP code.

setup.title: Set up TOTP
setup.description: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app to set up TOTP.
setup.unableToScan: Unable to scan? You can show the secret key :

success.title: TOTP Setup Successful
success.description: You have successfully set up TOTP for your account.
success.message: Your account is now protected with a second layer of security thanks to TOTP.

password.title: Password
password.description: Change your password to keep your account secure.

TOTP.title: TOTP
TOTP.description: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) adds an extra layer of security to your account by requiring a second form of verification when logging in.

passkey.title: Passkey
passkey.description: A passkey is a secure way to log in to your account without a password. It uses cryptographic keys stored on your device.

modal.title: Remove Passkey
modal.description: Are you sure you want to remove this passkey? This action cannot be undone.

add.title: Add to your wardrobe
add.description: Add a new item or outfit to your wardrobe.

createItem.title: Add an item
createItem.description: Fill out the form below to add a new clothing item to your wardrobe.

empty.title: No Clothes Yet
empty.description: You haven't added any clothing items yet. Start by creating your first item.

empty.title: No Outfits Yet
empty.description: You haven't created any outfits yet. Get started by mixing and matching your clothes.

style.question: What style are you going for today?

chooseOutfitModal.title: Choose this outfit
chooseOutfitModal.description: This will be the outfit you will be rocking today!

choosen.title: Today's Outfit
choosen.description: You're all set for today! Here's your chosen outfit.

change.title: Change Outfit
change.description: Are you sure you want to change your outfit for today? This action cannot be undone.

passwordReset.subject: Outfitter Password Reset
passwordReset.body: We received a request to reset your password for your Outfitter account. Click the link below to reset your password:
passwordReset.footer: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
